Name: The Life of Bally
About the game: The Life of Bally is a minimalist puzzle game that tells the story of Bally's life, passing trough all stages of life. Control Bally, a ball that move around a board and have to reach the portal. Solve 50 puzzles in a relaxing ambiance. Think about your moves to avoid the enemies and obstacles. Captivating history about Bally's life. Unlock 4 special levels collecting specials pieces left in levels. Relaxing sound ambience.
